sentences.english: For seven days eat bread made without yeast and on the seventh day hold a festival to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 你要喫無酵餅七日，到第七日要向耶和華守節。

sentences.english: Three times a year you are to celebrate a festival to me.
sentences.chinese: 一年三次，你要向我守節。

sentences.english: Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread， and in the seventh day shall be a feast to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 你要喫無酵餅七日，到第七日要向耶和華守節。
